      • pieceRules

        boolean pieceRules(int x,
                 int y,
                 boolean bool,
                 AbstractPiece targetPiece)
        This is a interface to make the pieces getting rules
        Parameters:
        x - - row
        y - - column
        bool - - whas there a piece found as target?
        targetPiece - - who is the piece to target, can be null
        Returns:
        true the piece can move to target position, else false
